name: Shuffleboard VR
description:
Available to Play Now for Free!

The classic game of Shuffleboard is now available to be played in Virtual Reality. Enjoy playing one of your favorite casual games in a open, simple, and clean environment. No real life space taking shuffleboard equipment is needed.

Features:

  • Single Player vs. Computer
  • Easy, Medium, and Hard Difficulty levels
  • Choose your puck color
  • Choice of 11, 15, and 21 to win
  • Jumbotron to view scoring and gameplay

* Requires an HTC Vive to play.
